result.title: Are there any problems with "%lld"?
result.content: As everyone knows, it's forbidden to submit code containing "%lld". Once I thought this is because "%lld" doesn't work in Codeforces' system. However, I happened to submit code using (#define LLD "%l" "ld") and use the macro LLD for printf, and it works all the time just like "%I64d", does anyone know the reason? Does it really always work with "%lld"?
